query.name: autocompletaPrincipioAttivo
query.sql: select distinct top ? 'C|' + FDI_0364 from APP_CA where APP_CA.FDI_0364 like ? and APP_CA.FDI_0021 in ('A', 'C', 'CN') order by 1 asc

query.name: autocompletaNomeFarmaco
query.sql: select distinct top ? 'D|' + left(APP_CA.FDI_4875, charindex('*', APP_CA.FDI_4875) - 1) from APP_CA where APP_CA.FDI_4875 like ? and APP_CA.FDI_0021 in ('A', 'C', 'CN') order by 1 asc

query.name: cercaPerPrincipioAttivo
query.sql: select distinct APP_CA.FDI_0371 + substring(APP_CA.FDI_4875, CHARINDEX('*', APP_CA.FDI_4875), 300) as dx from APP_CA where APP_CA.FDI_0364 like ? and APP_CA.FDI_0021 in ('A', 'C', 'CN') order by 1 asc

query.name: cercaGruppoPerPrincipioAttivo
query.sql: select distinct FDI_0001 as aic, FDI_0021 as classe, FDI_1010 as codeA, FDI_1094 as codeC from APP_CA where FDI_0364 like ? and FDI_4875 like ?

query.name: cercaGruppoPerDescrizioneEstesa
query.sql: select distinct FDI_0021 as classe, FDI_1010 as codeA, FDI_1094 as codeC from APP_CA where FDI_4875 like ?

query.name: cercaGruppoPerAIC
query.sql: select distinct FDI_0021 as classe, FDI_1010 as codeA, FDI_1094 as codeC, LEFT(FDI_4875, CHARINDEX('*', FDI_4875) - 1) as descrizione, substring(APP_CA.FDI_4875, CHARINDEX('*', APP_CA.FDI_4875) + 1, 300) as dosaggio from APP_CA where FDI_0001 like ?

query.name: cercaGruppoPerAIC_in
query.sql: select distinct FDI_0021 as classe, FDI_1010 as codeA, FDI_1094 as codeC, LEFT(FDI_4875, CHARINDEX('*', FDI_4875) - 1) as descrizione, substring(APP_CA.FDI_4875, CHARINDEX('*', APP_CA.FDI_4875) + 1, 300) as dosaggio from APP_CA where FDI_0001 in ( ? )

query.name: cercaDettagli
query.sql: SELECT TOP ? APP_CA.FDI_0001 as codice, APP_CA.FDI_4875 as descrizione, APP_CA.FDI_0041 as ditta, APP_CA.FDI_0021 as classe, APP_CA.FDI_0371 as forma, CASE APP_CA.FDI_9238 WHEN 0 THEN 99999.99 ELSE APP_CA.FDI_9238 END as prezzoAlPubblico, CASE APP_CA.FDI_0491 WHEN 0 THEN 99999.99 ELSE APP_CA.FDI_0491 END as prezzoRimborsoNazionale, APP_CA.FDI_0364 as principioAttivoBase, APP_CA.FDI_0340 as principioAttivo, APP_CA.FDI_9159 as inListaDiTrasparenza, APP_CA.FDI_9172 as generico, APP_CA.FDI_9250 as brand, APP_CA.FDI_0012 as tipoRicetta FROM APP_CA INNER JOIN TR025 ON APP_CA.FDI_0001 collate Latin1_General_CI_AS = TR025.FDI_T321 WHERE ? AND TR025.FDI_T324 = ? ORDER BY prezzoAlPubblico ASC, descrizione ASC

query.name: cercaDettagliSenzaUPS
query.sql: SELECT TOP ? APP_CA.FDI_0001 as codice, APP_CA.FDI_4875 as descrizione, APP_CA.FDI_0041 as ditta, APP_CA.FDI_0021 as classe, APP_CA.FDI_0371 as forma, CASE APP_CA.FDI_9238 WHEN 0 THEN 99999.99 ELSE APP_CA.FDI_9238 END as prezzoAlPubblico, CASE APP_CA.FDI_0491 WHEN 0 THEN 99999.99 ELSE APP_CA.FDI_0491 END as prezzoRimborsoNazionale, APP_CA.FDI_0364 as principioAttivoBase, APP_CA.FDI_0340 as principioAttivo, APP_CA.FDI_9159 as inListaDiTrasparenza, APP_CA.FDI_9172 as generico, APP_CA.FDI_9250 as brand, APP_CA.FDI_0012 as tipoRicetta FROM APP_CA WHERE ? ORDER BY prezzoAlPubblico ASC, descrizione ASC

query.name: tabellaOrdinataDosaggiPerPA
query.sql: SELECT TR028.FDI_T333 AS aic, TR028.FDI_T334 AS id_par, TR028.FDI_T335 AS id_seq, TR028.FDI_T338 AS pas_qta, TR028.FDI_T339 AS pas_um, TR028.FDI_T340 AS pas_perc, TR028.FDI_T342 AS pa_qta, TR028.FDI_T343 AS pa_um, TR028.FDI_T344 AS pa_perc, TR025.FDI_T324 AS ups, APP_CA.FDI_0371 AS forma FROM TR028 INNER JOIN TR025 ON TR028.FDI_T333 collate Latin1_General_CI_AS = TR025.FDI_T321 INNER JOIN APP_CA ON TR028.FDI_T333 collate Latin1_General_CI_AS = APP_CA.FDI_0001 WHERE APP_CA.FDI_0364 LIKE ? AND APP_CA.FDI_0021 in ('A', 'C', 'CN') AND TR028.FDI_T334 = 1 --AND TR025.FDI_T322 = 1 AND NOT (APP_CA.FDI_1010 IS NULL AND APP_CA.FDI_1094 IS NULL) ORDER BY aic ASC, id_par ASC, id_seq ASC

query.name: tabellaOrdinataDosaggiPerNF
query.sql: SELECT TR028.FDI_T333 AS aic, TR028.FDI_T334 AS id_par, TR028.FDI_T335 AS id_seq, TR028.FDI_T338 AS pas_qta, TR028.FDI_T339 AS pas_um, TR028.FDI_T340 AS pas_perc, TR028.FDI_T342 AS pa_qta, TR028.FDI_T343 AS pa_um, TR028.FDI_T344 AS pa_perc, TR025.FDI_T324 AS ups, APP_CA.FDI_0371 AS forma FROM TR028 INNER JOIN TR025 ON TR028.FDI_T333 collate Latin1_General_CI_AS = TR025.FDI_T321 INNER JOIN APP_CA ON TR028.FDI_T333 collate Latin1_General_CI_AS = APP_CA.FDI_0001 WHERE COALESCE (APP_CA.FDI_4875, APP_CA.FDI_0004) LIKE ? AND APP_CA.FDI_0021 in ('A', 'C', 'CN') AND TR028.FDI_T334 = 1 --AND TR025.FDI_T322 = 1 AND NOT (APP_CA.FDI_1010 IS NULL AND APP_CA.FDI_1094 IS NULL) ORDER BY aic ASC, id_par ASC, id_seq ASC
